decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 0.1.1 PL1 Existing Ground Floor Plan; 0.1.2 PL1 Existing First Floor Plan; 0.2.1 PL 1 Existing Front and Rear Elevations; 0.2.2 PL 1 Existing Side Elevation; 0.3.1 PL 1 Existing Sections; 1.1.1 PL 2 Proposed Ground Floor Plan; 1.1.2 PL 2 Proposed First Floor Plan; 1.2.1 PL 2 Proposed Front and Rear Elevations; 1.2.2 PL 2 Proposed Side Elevation; 1.3.1 PL 2 Proposed Sections
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (as amended), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021). | The high-level side elevation window of the extension hereby approved shall be obscured glazed, as shown on approved drawings.
Reason: To protect the amenity of adjoining occupiers in accordance with policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Single storey side extension; external alterations
